introducing custom about activity

title: introduce custom "shift down color" utility
message:
introduce custom "shift down color" utility

Based on this reply from http://stackoverflow.com/
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4928772/android-color-darker

use a custom utility instead of the one from material dialogs. This will
allow us to compile the lighter material dialogs library

title: rework batterylive
message:
rework batterylive

Now the app has a simple preference screen where users can choose all
the option and the apply.

The toolbar has a responsive theme

user can choose the top and the bottom battery colors in default mode

title: Introducing Battery and Time context modes
message:
Introducing Battery and Time context modes

- Battery mode:

if enabled the livewallpaper will change its colors according to charge
state and using evocative colors: Green, Yellow, Orange, Red;

Time Context:

if enabled the livewallpaper will change its colors according to the
hours of day and using evocative colors of the main moments of a day:
sunset, morning, zenit, afternoon, night;
